sdata.j: ↑急病↑↓きゅうびょう↓のために、↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼↑↓かれ↓の|↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|に↑駅↑↓えき↓に↑行↑↓い↓けなかった。
sdata.e: A sudden illness prevented me from going to the station to meet him.

sdata.j: ↑我↑↓わ↓が↑社↑↓しゃ↓のリオの↑代理人↑↓だいりにん↓が↑空港↑↓くうこう↓であなたを|↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|ます。
sdata.e: Our company's agent in Rio will meet you at the airport.

sdata.e: Roy needn't have hurried to the airport to meet his parents.

sdata.e: Good news was in store for us at home.

sdata.j: ジェーンを|↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|る↑事↑↓こと↓はわくわくします。
sdata.e: It is exciting to welcome Jane.

sdata.e: I have to go to the airport to meet my cousin.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓を↑東京↑↓とうきょう↓↑駅↑↓えき↓で|↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|た。
sdata.e: I met her at Tokyo Station.

sdata.j: |↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|にきてくださってありがとう。
sdata.e: Thank you for coming to meet me.

sdata.e: He was at the airport to meet Mr West.

sdata.e: She asked me to meet her at the station.

sdata.j: ↑明日↑↓あした↓、↑駅↑↓えき↓でお|↑出迎↑↓でむか↓え|しましょう。
sdata.e: I will meet you at the station tomorrow.
